text: Ralph E. Erickson (born October 3, 1928) is an American lawyer. He was the 11th Deputy Attorney General of the United States from 1972 to 1973 during the Richard Nixon presidency. Erickson was born in Jamestown, New York. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:People from Jamestown, New York Category:United States Deputy Attorneys General
title: Ralph E. Erickson
